mapper.sql: id, TENANT_ID, content, images, add_time, add_account, modify_time, modify_account
mapper.insert: insert into tenants_about_us (id, TENANT_ID, content, images, add_time, add_account, modify_time, modify_account) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tenants_about_us
id,
TENANT_ID,
content,
images,
add_time,
add_account,
modify_time,
modify_account,

mapper.update:
update tenants_about_us
TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_account = #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tenants_about_us set TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_account = #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id "id", a.content "content", a.images "imageUrl", b.TENANT_ID "tenantId", b.WEBSITE_NAME "websiteName" FROM tenants_apps b left join TENANTS_ABOUT_US a on a.TENANT_ID=b.TENANT_ID and a.is_usable ='1' WHERE b.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
